item.title:
Taylor begins to feel the artifice of the show fade, and the game becomes terrifyingly real. Amidst the beachfront setting, fairy-tale dates, and flowing champagne, pursuit turns into obsession and rivalry turns into treachery as reality itself blurs.
(https://variety.com/2023/film/news/riley-keough-nicholas-hoult-melissa-barrera-lana-condor-the-one-1235607380/…)
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Melissa Barrera, Lana Condor, Nicholas Hoult and Riley Keough to star in ‘THE ONE.’
It follows Taylor (Barrera), who’s made a last-ditch effort to find love by becoming a contestant on a reality dating show. She and two other women compete to win the heart of Mason (Hoult).
item.author: FilmUpdates
